description:
IPFire 2.29 Core Update 186 hardened open-source GNU/Linux distribution is now available for download with experimental Btrfs support, CPU frequency scaling for Raspberry Pi, and more.

The post IPFire Linux Firewall Gets Experimental Btrfs Support, Intel RFDS Mitigations appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: IPFire Linux Firewall Gets Experimental Btrfs Support, Intel RFDS Mitigations

description:
KDE Gear 24.05.1 open-source software suite is now available with improvements for Elisa, Spectacle, KCalc, Ark, Dolphin, and other KDE apps. Here are the details!

The post KDE Gear 24.05.1 Improves Elisa, Spectacle, KCalc, and Other KDE Apps appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Gear 24.05.1 Improves Elisa, Spectacle, KCalc, and Other KDE Apps
